nio/SSD1306ImageFile.Description:
Block for writing to an SSD1306 OLED screen on Intel Edison
Loads an image file from disk and then displays it to the screen.

file.description: Image file on disk. First checks absolute path, then relative to the nio project directory, then relative to the block code file.

Output.Description: Same list of signals as input.

nio/SSD1306PILImage.Description:
Block for writing to an SSD1306 OLED screen on Intel Edison
Displays a PIL Image file from an input signal to the screen.

image.description: Expression property needs to evaluate to a PIL Image object.

Input.Description: Any list of signals. Default *image* config is to have a PIL Image in the `image` attribute of the Signal.
